prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Lead, Drums, Bass, Piano, Organ, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Piano, Synth Lead, Organ, Bass, and Drums, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Piano, Synth Lead, Organ, Bass, and Drums, omitting the Guitar.

Style 3:
Guitar-less, this song is made up of Piano, Synth Lead, Organ, Bass, and Drums.
